page.title: 04Aston Cantlow Clubs
page.content: Aston Cantlow is a village of about a hundred houses.It is a very quiet village but there are quite a few clubs there. These are some of them: The Mother's Union,The Aston Cantlow Working Men's Club,The Women's Institute,The Sunday School and the Youth Club. The Youth Club was run by the church but has had to close down for lack of a leader.The Sunday School closes for day-school's summer holiday's.I started to talk to a lady.She told me that her husband was president of the Working Men's Club. It is open every Saturday and Sunday morning and has a good darts team. The W.I. is open every first Tuesday of a month.It is held in the village hall.
